title: Striking Modern Duplex in Central Żoliborz with Private Garage
description: This luxurious duplex in sought-after Żoliborz offers contemporary open-plan living across two stylish levels. Outfitted with exquisite hardwood floors and full wheelchair accessibility, the home features four seamlessly appointed bedrooms and two upscale bathrooms. The modern façade design commands street presence, complementing the sophisticated interiors and rare private underground garage.
neighborhood_description: Live in the heart of stylish Żoliborz, renowned for vibrant urban life and an unmistakable community feel. You'll enjoy walkable access to trendy cafés, artsy boutiques, and lush green spaces, with the business district moments away. Ovation-worthy public transit, extensive bike lines, and expedient highway access define the convenience of this lively neighborhood.
lifestyle_benefits: gly integrated with vibrant urban culture
plenty of outdoor fitness and recreation options
target_buyer: Ideal for ambitious entrepreneurs or professionals seeking a distinctive, accessible home base in central Warsaw with seamless work-life balance and space for family or home office needs.
market_positioning: Poised at the nexus of Żoliborz’s premium market segment, this duplex distinguishes itself with rare features and exquisite new construction finishes in a prime urban setting—perfect for buyers demanding both prestige and convenience.
